description: This Python script demonstrates how to use personalized memories and summaries within an agent, utilizing a PostgreSQL database with pgvector for storage, and includes example interactions with the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of interacting with memories, models, and storage.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles storage of memories in a PostgreSQL database with pgvector support.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages the agent's memories and summaries.

classes.name: OpenAIResponses
classes.description: Represents the OpenAI model responses used by the agent.

classes.name: PostgresAgentStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions in PostgreSQL.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent, optionally streaming.
